Sections.Title: Data we collect:
Sections.Content: None. You can verify this by yourself: the RookieHPC website is hosted on Github pages and its source code is publicly available.

Sections.Title: SSL encryption
Sections.Content: The RookieHPC website is hosted on Github pages, with enforced HTTPS encryption enabled. It uses a secure connection as you can see in the URL bar, which has a URL beginning with "https://" or displays a little lock icon. Thus, the communications between your browser and our server are encrypted using SSL and cannot be read by third parties.
